title: David Xavier | FullStack Developer

about.description: I'm David Xavier a 20 year old boy. I am currently taking my Computer Engineering course. I have already completed some professional training, because of this I gained the experience of programming for different platforms, such as Desktop applications, Mobile applications and Web applications. I have a huge passion for what I do and I have more and more motivation to improve my hard skills, and to become better and better at my job.

privacyPolity.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolity.row1: This data privacy guarantee statement applies specifically and exclusively to the service of the website 'davidxavier.website'.
privacyPolity.row2: When we ask for your name, email, among others, we aim to maintain a closer relationship with our users. After your consent, we are now able to contact you in order to respond to your needs and/or request made after using our services.
privacyPolity.row3: 'davidxavier.website' respects the privacy of all its users and guarantees that the information provided by users will not be used in any list for promotional purposes, via email, nor will it be disclosed to any other organization or company. 'davidxavier.website' is committed to the use of technology that is effective enough to make your online experience safer day by day and your relationships on the Web increasingly strengthened, collecting and processing data securely, preventing its loss or manipulation.
privacyPolity.row4: The data collected by 'davidxavier.website' will be used in accordance with the applicable legislation on the protection of personal data â€“ Law 58/2019 of 8 August, Data Protection Law â€“ in order to ensure confidentiality and security. of the personal data provided. They are intended to be used for communication with users, responding to requests for information.
privacyPolity.row5: If you have any questions regarding this commitment, please do not hesitate to contact us.
